snippet: An odd dance duo, if only for a brief moment: Helen Gurley Brown, the woman who promoted sex for the modern woman, and Archbishop Timothy M. Dolan, a leader of the Catholic Church in the United States.
abstract: An odd dance duo, if only for a brief moment: Helen Gurley Brown, the woman who promoted sex for the modern woman, and Archbishop Timothy M. Dolan, a leader of the Catholic Church in the United States.

headline.main: When the Archbishop Hugged Cosmo's Queen
headline.print_headline: When Prince of Church Hugged Queen of Cosmopolitan
